title: Business Intelligence Analyst at Boston Consulting Group (BCG)

summary.value: Enthusiastic individual with superior skills in working in both team- based and independent capacities. Bringing a strong work ethic and excellent organizational skills to any setting. Excited to begin a new challenge with a successful team. Fluent in English, Portuguese, and Spanish, offering solid comprehension of cultural diversity.

value.title: Sourcing Analyst
value.description: • Worked closely with the telecom sourcing manager to perform detailed cost analysis and data models for mobility RFPs, for countries such as Austria, France, Germany, UK, and US, to forecast the contractual cost, and savings for each vendor including factors such as FTE growth and turnovers • Built and managed data dashboards within PowerBI to provide relevant insights from Procurement areas ranging from supplier onboarding requests to spend related to value-added resellers across regions; in the building process, working closely with stakeholders to ensure the visualized data conveys the needed numbers and understand the cadence of the dashboard refresh • Collaborated with hardware sourcing managers on the global VAR strategy, with entails an annual spend of $60m, to secure BCG the most competitive prices for hardware and software products globally – leading to potential cost reductions, and to facilitate the purchasing process by implementing a product catalog for IT buyers • Owned and managed the IT Sourcing Intake Process by connecting with IT Leadership Partners and gathering requirements for the requested project(s) to then present to the category managers during weekly staff meetings; uses Jira as a PM tool • Supported sourcing team members on ad hoc requests ranging from creating slides to creating tailored spend reports

value.title: Operations Associate
value.description: • Managed the supplier onboarding and maintenance process on Coupa, handling over 10,000+ global suppliers, and acting as the procurement PoC for the same by ensuring a strong governance mechanism is in place including additional operational activities such as supplier risk assessment, contract validation, and due diligence checks • Worked closely with IT and process engineers to align Procure-to-pay (P2P) process improvement opportunities and design the roadmap to assess and implement opportunities into the process to guarantee customer satisfaction • Acted as a liaison with partners globally across the business such as Accounts Payable, BCG buyers, and category managers, to ensure compliance of SLAs and deliver against value driven aspects of the process • Maintained the Master Supplier Data to a high level of data integrity by using a combination of SAP BusinessObjects, Alteryx & PowerBI to perform regular reviews on suppliers onboarded data and identify any data inconsistency issues

value.title: Logistics and Content Team
value.description: • Developed three-day agenda for conference expecting 900+ attendees and creating an operational plan to ensure fluid on-site logistics and safety of acclaimed guest speakers • Sourced and negotiated attendees kits, event venue, guest speakers’ transportation, video recording, and photographic services, and online streaming reproduction services

value.title: Teaching Assistant for Facilities Planning and Material Handling
value.description: • Supported the professor in designing, implementing, and assessing the course material • Assisted professor with course-related tasks, including but not limited to conducting labs, organizing and proofreading assignments, bringing in guest speakers, and addressing student concerns

value.title: Global Procurement Co-op
value.description: • Collaborated with senior management on a digital transformation company- wide project of transitioning to a new workspace collaboration software tool– Slack – by developing informational facilitators and providing professional training in collaboration with HR to ensure the adequate use and educate employees of the software’s benefits • Administered the process of cleansing the supplier diversity master database on a weekly basis by verifying if listed new vendors were certified as minority suppliers, and created reports based on client requests • Analyzed big sets of non-IT related vendor spending data from 90+ offices in over 50 countries, using a combination of Tableau and Excel to develop strategies when developing and reviewing RFPs to reduce costs and gain efficiencies • Revamped the onboarding process for several departments using Trello boards to reduce miscommunications between the manager and the new employee

value.title: Marketing Director
value.description: Awarded $10,000 in startup competition hosted by Northeastern University, Promee is an app that connects local businesses and their target customer by providing them with a platform to post their latest announcements and special offers; allowing customers to follow and interact with their brands of interest and never miss a promotion again. • Planned and implemented strategic marketing programs, contributing to 4,000 downloads in a time frame of 3 months, by having bi-weekly meetings with the entire team to increase notable brand awareness and identity • Collaborated with graphic designers to develop engaging and end-marketing materials for weekly posts on social media platforms • Developed weekly KPI reports on new users, total users, and QR codes used to better understand the application and social media performance in order to increase user database

value.title: Category Buyer Co-op
value.description: • Collaborated in cultivating and managing relationships with suppliers, identifying opportunities and negotiating discounts for shopping holidays • Analyzed sales data on specific SKUs to strategize revenue growth opportunities for outdoor and textile categories • Performed a 6-month long website analysis, focusing on the customer’s on-site experience, to identify tactics to increase the categories’ click and conversion rates

value.title: Summer Analyst
value.description: • Created a checklist to ensure high level of customer service for incoming calls • Collaborated on the restructuring of the Franchising department by drawing flowcharts, creating Pareto graphs, and compiling information about the companies that signed new contracts in the previous 3 months • Designed a calculator for the telemarketing sector to compute the amount a client would save if he/she signed a contract with Itaú • Created Excel reports of the telemarketing campaigns to send out to the entire company • Participated in a 2-week Kaizen about the refunding and pricing issues of the company by discussing possible solutions and transferred flowcharts into Excel

value.title: Bachelor of Science - BS, Industrial Engineering
Brazilian, American and International Baccalaureate Diploma
Lean Six Sigma Green Belt Certification
